items.content_html:
The greatest thing we can do is to help somebody know that they‚Äôre loved and capable of loving.

  • dctr.pro/252

Trailer: ‚ÄúWon‚Äôt you be my Neighbour‚Äù documentary on Mister Fred Rogers.

Breaking news and classic Zuckerberg:

We made mistakes

#ownyourdata #freetheweb #indieweb

Any suggestion on how people here organise their podcasts in @marco‚Äôs overcast app. I am rubbish at this and have a huge list but don‚Äôt really listen to as much as I want as I don‚Äôt look enough. Smart playlists?

When we design for screen, we are designing for a fluid medium. This is a critical difference between interaction design and graphic design.

  • dctr.pro/251 - awesome series on designing UI / UX experiences by @fehler
Normally this guy is a symbol of hope to me but these last few months haven‚Äôt really left me smiling much. Bring on the summer please.

The old greyhound stock car stadium finally being demolished making way for our new Stadium back at Plough Lane, amazing fairytale that just keep giving @AFCWimbledon in May 2002 I thought I had seen my last game of football who knew what was to come! youtu.be/vGMjLGBu5‚Ä¶
Interview: Social Media Discontent after Cambridge Analytica - dctr.pro/250
What‚Äôs App no no no. I have my data saved in iCloud via backup I guess it‚Äôs not an export you don‚Äôt appear to have that option. Deleting what‚Äôs app account deletes back up too! Grrrr

Host of Interesting roles at @WinSciCentre - www.winchestersciencecentre.org/join-us/

n.b links don‚Äôt seem to open in latest firefox / chrome on Mac (Safari ok) but if you copy link address/location and paste into URL bar it will fyi
Isle of Dogs looks amazing - www.youtube.com/watch - Love Wes Anderson üêï üèùüíõ

This wasn‚Äôt a breach in the technical sense. It is something even more troubling: an all-too-natural consequence of Facebook‚Äôs business model.

The New York Times - dctr.pro/24z
No I won‚Äôt fix up my newsletter I‚Äôll wait in my broken down car at peak time for RAC due to power fail I can‚Äôt even lock it, dam it. 2018 so far has been rubbish.
My Fragmentum microcast Episode 16 is out now. Please Subscribe in Overcast for iOS or another inferior podcatcher.
Like my stuff, love my stuff support me on Patreon. Patreon.com/procterbot - clickable link in bio
It‚Äôs 2018 and the odds are still stacked against female creatives. Double or Nothing #DoubleorNothingAiga

Ok finally got round to sorting out my Pateron page. https://www.patreon.com/procterbot - I have set up various Jars to allow friends and followers to show support for the stuff I produce on my micro.blog, microcast and more specifically in terms of edutech research.

Great to see more and more designtech covering ethical design now. dctr.pro/24x cc @aral I think that now human centred design has to now move to Humanity Centred Design and Delightful Design Experiences consider human rights at all levels of interaction. #levelup

The only thing we can do is delete Facebook. And Messenger, and Whatsapp, and Instagram, and every app like them.

  • dctr.pro/24w
More comment on the Facebook data ‚Äúbreach‚Äù - dctr.pro/24v
Nice graphics for WWDC 2018

It‚Äôs clear this was not a Facebook data breach because the data was not stolen or hacked, it was handed to Cambridge Analytica the same way it is handed to any Facebook API partner. It‚Äôs worse than a breach, it‚Äôs Standard Procedure.

50 million Facebook profiles harvested for Cambridge Analytica in major data breach.

dctr.pro/24u
I also agree with @caseyliss the iOS keyboard has become much more stupid in picking the words I want and allowing much more mistyping.

items.title: Hey Siri
items.content_html:
Record audio

I have many moments driving or walking where I have a thought in my head and I need to capture is as close to the metal as possible as soon as possible, so a voice recording would be the closest but Hey Siri Record Audio‚Ä¶. nope. You have say Hey Siri new Voice Memo but it still doesn‚Äôt auto start recording‚Ä¶ hey Siri you are a pain

Turn off Phone?

Guess not
Graphic cards
